channel.title: xBA on Dawg & Hen
channel.description: Recent content in xBA on Dawg & Hen

item.title: Why Gavin Lux couldn't accept the fly-out
item.description: We put the Statcast info on every pitch and hit. It contains more informations than our intuition sometimes. The estimated batting average, estimated slugging from the exit velocity and the launch angle shows Gavin’s hit could have been a homer or an extra base hit at least. Gavin must have felt it’d be a bif fly after he hit it hard.
